title: Pyramid Great
content: This construction is a masterpiece of technology and architecture. Only countless years of intense labor and vast amounts of wealth could be spent to produce such a building. If left untouched, this pyramid will become a symbol; a monument to ancient civilizations, displaying their greatest achievements. But it is an awful lot of stone to just lie there undisturbed.
